Description:
POSITION AND POTENTIAL AN INTOXICATING MIX!
*************** UNDER OFFER ******************
SALE BY EXPRESSION OF INTEREST CLOSING 24 JULY @ 4:00 PM
A chance to create your own masterpiece on a brilliant tree lined-street followed with a north facing rear yard that backs onto McDonell Park
This versatile solid 3 bedroom residence is ideally located within walking distance to popular Station Street cafes and restaurants and public transport, comprising of formal lounge, open plan dining/kitchen, central bathroom and laundry, polished timber floors throughout, ducted heating, and off street parking.
INSPECT BY APPOINTMENT OR AS ADVERTISED
CORONAVIRUS: Prevention Protection
As news of Coronavirus COVID -19 continues to make headlines Moss Estate Agents are following best practice precautionary measures to minimize risk to staff and clients. Together we can support one another to minimize the risk by taking reasonable safety measures. We will continue to provide a service to clients wishing to inspect or discuss their property needs however we strongly recommend that any potential attendee re-consider or delay an inspection/private appointment to inspect or a general appointment with one of our staff if they are feeling unwell with symptoms of COVID 19, or had contact with any person who has been diagnosed with COVID 19 or recently returned from overseas travel.
Visit: Department of Health - Australian Government - Symptoms

Description:
So much scope in serene court
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST CLOSING SATURDAY 22ND AUGUST
Turn dreams into reality: on a vast allotment of approximately 830m2, this five bedroom plus study, two bathroom home calls to young families and builders/developers (subject to council approval) from a quiet court. With abundant space, good light, immediate comfort and the opportunity to update over time or begin again and build new (STCA), it offers a kitchen/dining/living, rumpus, second kitchen/family, rear garden and enormous covered deck. Complete with an ensuite, family bathroom and powder room, the home also offers high ceilings, polished floorboards, heating, cooling, a carport, additional driveway parking and wide street frontage. Close to Fairfield Village, transport options, Northcote Aquatic Centre, McDonell Park and schools, it's just 7.5 kilometres from the CBD.
Insights: 255 Arthur Street, Fairfield VIC 3078 was last sold in 1985 and 14 other 4 bedroom house in Fairfield have recently been sold.

Description:
Period charm in the heart of Northcote
INSPECTIONS STRICTLY BY APPOINTMENT - CONTACT AGENT
This inviting 1940s clinker brick home merges period charm, low maintenance outdoor space and a superb locale in the heart of Northcote. A picket and brick fence and lovingly-tended garden welcome you up the steps to the curved portico. Across the threshold is a generous living and dining space, with north-facing double-hung windows, lush carpet, original cornices and a cosy fireplace with gas heater. The generous kitchen and meals area features retro laminate benchtop, window to the rear courtyard and plenty of storage. There are two spacious bedrooms separated by a sparkling bathroom with vanity and wall storage. Other features include off-street parking, garage, separate laundry and second WC. In a quiet yet amazingly convenient neighbourhood, metres to Red Door Corner Store and a short walk to all of High Streets exceptional eating, drinking and shopping options. Zoned for Westgarth Primary and Northcote High school, with easy access to trams and trains and All Nations parkland, this is easy living in a spectacular lifestyle location.
Insights: 52 Mitchell Street, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 1980 and 70 other 2 bedroom house in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
A charming Victorian relishes its new role
Perfectly placed in a family friendly pocket of Abbotsford, this delightful domain provides all the classic appeal of a Hawthorn brick Victorian terrace with a chic modern twist. Showcasing soaring high ceilings, leafy outdoor entertaining and abundant natural light, enjoy outstanding cosmopolitan living with sleek contemporary finishes and a versatile floorplan. Instantly inviting from the lush front garden and charming Victorian faÃ§ade, open plan living at the rear is complemented by timber floors and skylight, illuminating the stylish Bosch kitchen which opens out to a verdant deck perfect for alfresco dining and entertaining. Both generous downstairs bedrooms incorporate robes and original fireplaces, accompanied by a large versatile third bedroom upstairs with plantation shutters. A pristine bathroom with rain shower and marble vanity includes a European laundry. Positioned close to Yarra River walking trails, Collingwood train station, Johnston Street shops and Gahan Reserve.
Insights: 71 Yarra Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2012 and 26 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
A stunning fusion of designer luxe & sumptuous style
Contemporary innovation honouring its iconic Foy & Gibson position is reflected throughout this brilliant apartment with its warehouse-like volume and beautiful bespoke features. Set beyond a striking modern profile and Chesterfield filled lobby with lift, this secure north-facing apartment is a stunning mix of style, sophistication and light-filled space created by Elenberg Fraser architects and Gurner developments. Shining brass accents, sleek stone finishes and chic design elements are showcased throughout the high-ceiling interior with its large double-glazed windows capturing natural light and supreme quality appointments adding a luxurious edge. Dedicated to gourmet pleasures, the Ilve-equipped kitchen features a cocktail cabinet and dining benchtop while the adjoining living room opens to an extra-spacious covered balcony with bar bench and historic Foy & Gibson outlook. There are 2 smart bedrooms with mirror built-in robes including the main with beautiful ensuite, plus a designer bathroom, European laundry, heating/cooling, video intercom, oak floors and a basement car space with storage cage on title. This exceptional modern apartment in Melbourne's premier warehouse precinct is all about lifestyle with cafes at the doorstep and the cultural buzz of Smith & Brunswick Streets just nearby.
Insights: 405/107 Cambridge Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning double storey designer home in a prized Fitzroy North pocket
*Due to Melbourne's Stage 4 Restrictions, all Nelson Alexander team members are working from home. Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to view this property virtually. Thank you.*
A showcase of relaxed contemporary comfort in a blue ribbon Fitzroy North locale, this stunning designer home boasts a luxurious double storey layout enjoying city views and north facing alfresco entertaining with ROW access. It is ideally placed strolling distance to Nicholson Village, city trams, Merri Creek parklands and a selection of schools. Set beyond a landscaped courtyard, the elegant faÃ§ade reveals an entrance hall with a tranquil garden gallery, which leads to a double bedroom with built-ins and verandah access, generous glass-framed study and bright bathroom with laundry facilities. Flooded in light at the back is a sleek granite kitchen with stainless steel European gas appliances and a breakfast bar, and huge open plan living and dining area flowing to a sun drenched rear courtyard and large automatic garage with laneway access. Upstairs is a second robed bedroom with a balcony embracing the CBD outlook, mezzanine-style sitting area, sparkling bathroom with a shower and spa bath, and deluxe master bedroom with a walk through robe, rear balcony and bathroom access. It features hydronic heating throughout, split system a/c upstairs, an alarm, solar panels, great storage and polished floorboards.
Insights: 17 Barkly Street, Fitzroy North VIC 3068 was last sold in 2020 and 54 other 3 bedroom house in Fitzroy North have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Easy Northcote Entry or Investment
*Due to Melbourne's Stage 4 Restrictions, all Nelson Alexander team members are working from home. Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to view this property virtually. Thank you.*
(Subject to a tenancy determinable by notice)
A cosmopolitan and maintenance-free apartment, just metres from city-bound trains and moments from the vibrancy of High St, this light and airy, first floor, mid 20th Century apartment combines an outstanding lifestyle offering with investment credentials that are hard to ignore. With 2 bedrooms, generous living and parking, the home ticks all the boxes as an entry point or investment in the sophistication of Melbourne's inner-north.
Revealing terrific views that include glimpses of the city skyline, the home is comfortably liveable or leasable while offering scope to introduce your own style whenever you are ready. The kitchen / meals is semi-attached to a lounge, whilst each of the bedrooms is appointed with built-in robes and the bathroom is conveniently independent to the wc.
Accessed securely via video entry, the home also features a parking space, allowing you to leave the car at home and walk to St Georges Road trams and Northcote Station, High Street shops and cafes, also close to acres of parkland and Merri Creek walking/cycling trails, Northcote Primary School and Northcote High School (zoned to both). Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 9/4 Mccracken Avenue, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 2014 and 84 other 2 bedroom unit in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture Perfect Parkside Living!
In prime position between All Nations Park and High St bars, cafes and trams sits this impeccably renovated villa unit, oozing style in Northcote's most popular pocket. Enjoy light-filled, open plan living with an immaculate kitchen including Caesarstone bench tops, gas cooking, custom cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. A gleaming bathroom features floating vanity and matte black tapware, and two well-proportioned bedrooms have mirrored built-in robes. An outdoor courtyard with shaded dining area is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing afternoon. Additional features include split system air-conditioning, gas hot water, timber floorboards, full laundry, separate toilet, ample storage and garage parking. A must see!

Description:
BEST VALUE IN ABBOTSFORD PRICED TO SELL
Perfect for first home buyers, investors and down-sizers this super convenient, modern, low maintenance apartment is a must to inspect!
The bright open plan living/dining is complemented by sleek kitchen area featuring stone bench tops, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, dishwasher and great storage space.
Relax after a days work (or while working from home!) with your own balcony.
Main bedroom features full length mirror built in robes and the sleek modern bathroom includes Euro style laundry facilities.
Features also include:
- Secure intercom entry and lift access
- Secure basement car space and a storage cage
- Heating & cooling
Also enjoy the resort-style living facilities including:
- outdoor heated swimming pool with spa
- lounge area
- gym
- roof top terrace with barbecue facilities
- cinema
- on-site concierge service
Make the most of the location with direct access to the Yarra River bike and walking trails, trams practically at your doorstep, walking distance to cafes, and opposite the Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre for all of your shopping needs.
Insights: 411/4 Acacia Place, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2020 and 34 other 1 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
THE ULTIMATE PROJECT BUT NOT HABITABLE NOW
**REGISTRATION FOR AUCTION CLOSES STRICTLY AT 4:30PM**
This Hawthorn brick Victorian stands in a pretty of row of terraces.
In need of total renovation, this is not for the faint hearted but the rewards could be incredible!
- 5 principle rooms
- Rear lane for possible car access
- Land 5m x 25.5m approx.
- Neighbourhood Residential with a Heritage Overlay
- NOTE FOR SAFETY REASONS NO ACCESS TO FIRST FLOOR OR REAR YARD
- PROPERTY MUST GO TO AUCTION
- Strictly 10% deposit and 60 day settlement
PLEASE NOTE: there is cracking throughout, the roof is leaking in numerous places, flooring is not existent and falling away. There are broken sewerage pipes and potential sewage leakage, rising damp, ceilings are at risk of collapse, mould, no access to rear yard due to growth over doorways. The kitchen and bathroom are non-operational and the bathroom is boarded up.
Due to the large number of enquiries we are receiving, only those with phone numbers will be answered.
We have included an online tour. We encourage you to please view this prior to arranging a time to come through.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.
Insights: 26 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
North-facing spacious 1 bedroom apartment with direct access to Fairfield Park and Yarra River!
Ideal for first home, down-sizer or investor
This surprisingly spacious 1 bedroom apartment offers an outstanding City-edge lifestyle; in a low-rise boutique building, backing to the charming Fairfield Park, Fairfield Boathouse and the Yarra River, and a short walk to delicious cafes and restaurants at Station street. Easy walk to Dennis Train Station.
With north-facing private balcony, a light filled open-plan living area lined with a beautiful Oak floor leading to a relaxing master bedroom, where you find a study area and fully fitted walk-in wardrobe. The modern bathroom has a large shower. The secure undercover car park space and the storage cage are conveniently located. All windows are double-glazed and the split system air-conditioner offers increased comfort.
There are plenty of other features including video intercom, swipe key system and other security features for peace of mind. The modern kitchen is appointed with beautiful Caesarstone kitchen bench and SMEG appliances.
This is an opportunity not to be missed. Visit at open Inspection or by appointment.
The Phone Code for this property is: 92217. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
Disclaimer:
Whilst every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, For Sale By Owner (forsalebyowner.com.au Pty Ltd) cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective buyers or tenants need to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Warm, Distinctive & Desirably Placed
Superbly positioned in a coveted and quiet tree-lined street mere moments to trams, trains and Northcote's best features, this extraordinary Victorian is a distinctive and welcoming three bedroom home that proves quite a revelation. Polished floorboards and exposed brick walls combine in a warm palette, enhancing character and harmonising with enticing design that optimises space and incorporates thoughtful additions. Embrace meal preparation in the generous kitchen/dining with everything you need at your fingertips and French doors adjoining a relaxing side courtyard. Timber countertops include an island bench, kitchen storage is excellent and appliances range from a stove with five-burner gas cooktop to a canopy rangehood and dishwasher. A radiant separate lounge room impresses, leading to a large entertainer's deck and courtyard garden accessing a right of way. Bedrooms stand out with unexpected extras two bedrooms downstairs ( the front room hosts a handy mezzanine) whilst another is upstairs forming a delightful loft, perfect for watching city fireworks and well furnished with storage space. Further offering both a bathroom and powder room, solar panels, heating, cooling, Velux skylights and high ceilings, this charismatic home is zoned to Northcote High and a stroll to dynamic High Street and All Nations Park.
Insights: 63 Gladstone Avenue, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 2020 and 117 other 3 bedroom house in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
Family gem with Renovation Potential and Parkside Poise
ONLINE AUCTION WEDNESDAY 5TH AUGUST AT 6PM
To participate in the online auction, please follow the link below to register to bid:
https://auctionnow.com.au/properties/63197
Presenting a wealth of potential and abundant land approx. 578sqm, including large back garden neighbouring Rubie Thomson Reserve, this immediately comfortable three bedroom home will inspire those considering a showpiece renovation/extension or new build project (STCA). Classic details blend with modern comforts throughout large family lounge, dining room and gas kitchen with meals space opening to an undercover outdoor area. Also includes central bathroom, laundry/toilet and three bedrooms, most with built-in-robes. Plus, split-system air conditioners, polished timber floors, garage/workshop and storeroom/shed. Nearby to Fairfield Village cafes, High Street shops, Northcote Plaza, top schools, excellent recreation/sporting facilities and public transport, the location is second to none.

Description:
An Impeccably-Presented Size Surprise
Expressions of Interest Closing Tuesday 4th August 2020 at 3:00pm
So impressive are the proportions, the presentation and the Fairfield Village-fringe position of this extra-spacious three bedroom, two bathroom residence that lucky new owners will be in for an exceptional lifestyle. Wide rose-lined garden frontage with off-street parking introduces this single-level Edwardian blending elegant character, modern features, high ceilings and potential to further update throughout a flexible, light-filled interior. Complete with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, polished floorboards, ceiling fans and built-in robes, this delightful home offers broad fretwork hallway, beautiful main bedroom and second both with open fireplaces, fabulous living and dining room with French doors, substantial kitchen, central bathroom and a versatile lounge room in an adjoining wing with second bathroom/laundry and air-conditioned bedroom. Alfresco enjoyment whether it be a quiet coffee or kids play is also perfectly addressed by a large, enclosed, all-season's entertainment deck (bistro blinds, fan, insulation) overlooking a sunny rear garden with storage sheds and wide ROW gate access. A superb Fairfield opportunity, this meticulously-maintained home is brilliantly located just a short stroll to shops, cafes, primary schools, train station and Yarra River parklands.
** Inspection by appointment only - Please contact the listing agent to arrange. Our inspection guidelines and policies for attendance can be viewed by visiting: https://bit.ly/CollinsSimmsCOVID-19 **
Insights: 72 Arthur Street, Fairfield VIC 3078 was last sold in 1996 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Fairfield have recently been sold.

Description:
Secure Your Slice of Northcote
Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction 5 August at 5pm
*** This property is available for inspection by appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time ***
Enjoying the perfect corner position in peaceful surroundings, you'll love this freshly-updated, solid brick residence; a perfect lifestyle location with room to breath on a sizeable 285 Sqm.
Step inside to discover light-filled living with delightful garden outlook, a modern kitchen (with stainless gas cooktop) and meals area leading out to an excellent covered alfresco entertaining zone. Outside, enjoy landscaped gardens with established trees.
Relax in three good sized bedrooms (one with extensive built-in robes) and a stylish tiled bathroom. Plus, a separate laundry and additional powder room.
With additional benefits including with central heating/cooling, off street parking and solar panels, this beautiful home places you walking distance to parks as the excellent cafes and shops on High Street. You can walk to Northcote Aquatic Centre and Clifton Street Children's Centre (just around the corner) and buses are moments away. It's just 20 minutes into the CBD and offers easy access to fantastic local school options.
*** COVID-19 ANNOUNCEMENT ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team members, and if requested wait outside until the property is ready for the appointment. Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.
Insights: 2a Swift Street, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 2020 and 117 other 3 bedroom house in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
ONLINE AUCTION WEDNESDAY 12TH AUGUST AT 8PM
The sweet spot for lifestyle and locale. Commanding a sought after position on top of Rucker's Hill with breathtaking uninterrupted city views, this private, dual level townhouse is moments from the buzz of High Street.
Spacious and sun-drenched, upstairs is a modern living and dining floor with gourmet kitchen featuring granite benchtops, glass splashback, quality Miele appliances including integrated dishwasher. Crafted with entertaining in mind, floor to ceiling glass sliding doors open to a large private alfresco terrace with garden and sweeping city views.
The impressive entry level comprises three double bedrooms all with built-in robes, the generous master with ensuite enjoys superb city views framed by a high ceiling. Adding to the appeal is a refined main bathroom, concealed laundry and dedicated, fitted study space. Finishing touches include zoned ducted heating and cooling, mains pressure solar hot water, impressive storage throughout, intercom / secure entry, CCTV, large storage cage and two side-by side car spaces in a secure basement.
Delivering a brilliant low maintenance lifestyle in a boutique block of 14, step out the front door and you're surrounded by High St cafes, restaurants and shops with trams to the CBD. Zoned to Northcote High School, this urban retreat is in easy walking distance to two train lines, Westgarth village, Northcote Plaza and Merri Creek trails.
Insights: 12/44-46 James Street, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 2015 and 13 other 3 bedroom unit in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
Captivating Victorian Terrace
**Inspections by Private Appointment**
Retaining romantic appeal, the residence showcases an enviable position, epitomising the inner northern lifestyle.
Immaculate presentation throughout, the impressive home boasts 2 elegant bedrooms with built in robes, inviting living room with gas-coal fireplace, kitchen/meals with stainless steel Bellini dishwasher and bathed in natural light.
Combining traditional period charm, typical of the era and Eco friendly upgrades like solar panel energy, LED lighting and water saving fittings.
The property features a central bathroom with double shower, euro style laundry, split system heating/cooling and favourable North facing courtyard/garden.
Located in arguably one of Collingwoods finest residential streets, within close proximity to popular gastro pubs, artisanal boutiques, vibrant nightlife, cafes, restaurants, public transport options and Yarra River bikes trails.
Current Covid-19 Notice
https://www.vic.gov.au/coronavirus-covid-19-restrictions-victoria
Insights: 84 Hotham Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Urban Living with Streamline Design
ONLINE AUCTION MONDAY 3RD AUGUST AT 5.30PM - please contact agent to register
Mimicking a terraced house exterior, this ultra chic two bedroom, ground floor apartment offers private street entry and a low maintenance lifestyle for city dwellers, starters and investors. Perfectly utilising space, the open plan allows for a sunny and versatile living/meals to showcase a stylish kitchen well-equipped in stainless steel Miele appliances, integrated fridge and glass splashback; while large bedrooms (one with dual access) are fitted with mirrored BIRs and flank a modern bathroom featuring shower, toilet and vanity. Including floorboards throughout, heat/cooling, concealed Euro laundry, linen cupboard, communal gardens, designated car space and storage cage. Next door to Northcote Aquatic Centre, it's close to transport, Fairfield Village, Northcote Plaza and High Street.
Insights: 6A/168 Victoria Road, Northcote VIC 3070 was last sold in 2017 and 84 other 2 bedroom unit in Northcote have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Charm And A Village Vibe
Hosting many traditional family milestones and offering fond memories for its long standing homeowners, this much treasured two bedroom brick gem also boasts a quiet cul-de-sac locale with village neighbourhood vibe, large block of land approximately 533sqm and excellent renovation/extension opportunities (STCA). Immaculately presented, with original high ornate ceilings, polished timber floorboards, decorative cornices and picture rails, this eternally charming home has a classic floor plan offering inviting entry hall and light filled front lounge with tapestry brick fireplace. Plus, an open plan dining space where large family gatherings and celebrations with friends have been enjoyed over many years. Welcoming modern touches is a retro-style kitchen with gas stove, ample storage and breakfast bar. Comfortable and charming accommodation comprises two spacious bedrooms, one includes built-in-robe. They are well-served by an updated central bathroom, separate laundry and toilet. Year round comfort is assured with ducted heating and cooling systems and split-system air conditioner. Features deep backyard with flourishing fruit trees, large steel shed, storage and gated side driveway to front carport. Situated only moments away from thriving Station Street shops, cafÃ©s, Fairfield Primary School, playgrounds and Fairfield Station, with excellent proximity to Yarra Bend Park, university and hospital precincts and the CBD.
Insights: 2 Monamore Street, Fairfield VIC 3078 was last sold in 2020 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Fairfield have recently been sold.
